briefTitle: A Trial Testing Professional and Peer-led Support Online Support Groups for Young Canadian Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: A Randomized Control Trial Testing the Efficacy of Professional and Peer-Led Online Support Groups for Young Canadian Breast Cancer Survivors
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* less than 46 years old with primary breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* older than 45 and in active treatment
